code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Cadastrar.css';import{useFont}from'./context/ZoomContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[nome,setNome]=useState('');const[dataNascimento,setDataNascimento]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[senha,setSenha]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const{fontSize}=useFont();const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();const formData={nome,dataNascimento,email,senha};console.log('Form Data:',formData);navigate('/zoom');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",style:{fontSize:"".concat(fontSize,"px")},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Cadastra-se"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Nome:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:nome,onChange:e=>setNome(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Data de Nascimento:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:dataNascimento,onChange:e=>setDataNascimento(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Senha:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:senha,onChange:e=>setSenha(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"login-button",children:"Criar conta"})]})]});};export default Login;
